item.description:
This meetup starts Friday January 23rd and ends Sunday January 25th. The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett, NH this weekend and guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fees. We’re within minutes of Attitash, Bretton Woods and Wildcat, so people will be out skiing or boarding at one of these areas, some of us will be heading to Bretton Woods on the 24th where the FNX Snoriders will be having an après ski event. There will also be some local après ski events in the afternoon and evening at nearby ski clubs.

Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.
Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the club!
item.name: Ski Weekend in NH
